stylelintplus.config.description: Stylelint config. If config and configFile are unset, stylelint will automatically look for a config file.

stylelintplus.configFile.description: Stylelint config file. If config and configFile are unset, stylelint will automatically look for a config file.

stylelintplus.configOverrides.description: Stylelint config overrides. These will be applied on top of the config, configFile, or auto-discovered config file loaded by stylelint.

stylelintplus.enable.description: If false, stylelint will not validate the file.

stylelintplus.validateOnSave.description: Validate after saving. Automatically enabled if autoFixOnSave is enabled.

stylelintplus.trace.server.description: Capture trace messages from the server.

description: stylelint extension for coc.nvim supporting additional features
